snippet: The N.H.L. and the players union will meet this week after the league sought to reduce the players’ share of revenue by 11 percentage points in its initial offer.
abstract: NHL and the players union are set to meet for three days of labor talks; the league seeks to end long-term front-loaded contracts and reduce the players’ share of revenue by 11 percentage points.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. and the players union will meet this week after the league sought to reduce the players’ share of revenue by 11 percentage points in its initial offer.

headline.seo: Union’s Response to N.H.L. Offer May Dictate Course of Talks
headline.main: Union’s Response to N.H.L. Offer May Dictate Course of Talks
headline.print_headline: Union’s Response to Hard-Line Proposal May Dictate Course of Talks
